Summary: Good, but not the real thing.
text: For being an instant coffee, Via is very good, but don't expect it to have the aroma or flavor of fresh brewed Italian Roast.  Very convenient, and no clean up.  Tried the Via French Roast because there were a few reviews about how it's the best.  Still prefer the Via Italian Roast... the Via French Roast is not any darker as you'd expect in the real coffee world, plus it has a tiny hint of a strange aroma/flavor.
